body.p: Hippo ECM is an open source Enterprise Content Management solution. It's targeted at medium to large organisations managing content for multi-channel distribution like web sites and intranets. It facilitates an open and flexible way of using your information by following international accepted open standards.

section.name: Learning about Hippo ECM

Run Hippo ECM
Use Hippo ECM

Develop Hippo ECM

section.name: How to get support
section.p: Support for Hippo ECM is available in a variety of different forms.
To get started, search the documentation, the wiki, issue tracker, or the mailing list archives to see if the problem has been solved or reported before.

If the problem has not been reported before, the recommended way to get help is to subscribe to the Hippo ECM Users Mailing list . Many other users and Hippo ECM developers will answer your questions there, and the answer will be archived for others in the future.
Commercial support is provided by Hippo.
